Note: ssh è¿œç¨‹æµ‹è¯•è„šæœ¬

Shell

#!/bin/bash

eval "$(ssh-agent)"
ssh-add

dir="$(ssh "$1" mktemp -d)"
scp ./*-*.s "$1:$dir"

ssh "$1" 'grep "model name" /proc/cpuinfo | head -n1'

for i in 1-1 1-2 1-3 1-4 2-1 2-2 2-3 2-4 2-5 2-6; do
    echo "$i"
    ssh "$1" gcc "$dir/$i.s" -o "$dir/$i"
    for _ in $(seq 1 10); do
        ssh "$1" /usr/bin/time "$dir/$i"
    done
done

ssh "$1" rm -r "$dir"

ssh-agent -k
